name: Sarbik Gram Bikash Kendra
briefDescription: Village organisation has been strengthened in 200 villages.Interest towards education has been developed among tribal parents and students. 5000 youth has got vocational training through TRYSEM ProgrammeMigrations of labor have been checked to a great extent. Self employment opportunities have been created among unemployed youth through vocational training on Bamboo, Jute, Babui Grass, Tailoring, and Embroidery etc.Consciousness developed on health and hygienic aspect community.A rural based eye hospital L.C. Dani Eye Hospital the epitomized unit of Sarbik Gram Bikash Kendra, was opened in the year of 1987. Every year about 3000 eye operation done and about 35,000 eye treatment and about 10 â€“ 20 congenital cataract operation.About 1,00,000 low cost sanitation installation in Ghatal Sub Division covering 5 block in Paschim Medinipur District and installation of 617 latrine in Primary School.In the district of Purulia a most backward district in West Bengal where organisation 11 year working experience and implementing project under supported Action Aid India on Education, Health, Economic and Group organisation for Tribal Community.Established 10 Bed HIV/AIDS Care Unit, about 800 PLHIV registered under this programme.
